overview: Pamela Sutch wrote, edited, directed, and starred in this followup of the original Kidnapped and Chloroformed movie. Pam once again finds herself bound, gagged and chloroformed. But, thereâ€™s a lot more to the kidnapping than meets the eye! Also starring Debbie D, Elizabeth Raven, Stephen McKay and Vincent Sanchez. This tape contains chloroforming, binding and gagging, strangulation, repetitive cursing and phrases, dragging, carrying, bad acting, good acting and blood and gore!
title: Kidnapped and Chloroformed Again
